description: This file defines the ApiService interface for network communication using Retrofit. It specifies methods for fetching categories, content items, content details, and live channels in an Android TV frontend application.

classes.name: ApiService
classes.description: Retrofit API interface defining network calls for categories, contents, content details, and live channels.

methods.name: categories
methods.description: Fetches a list of categories from the backend.

methods.name: contents
methods.description: Fetches a list of content items, optionally filtered by category ID or search query.

methods.name: contentDetails
methods.description: Retrieves detailed information for a specific content item by ID.

methods.name: liveChannels
methods.description: Fetches a list of live channels.
